$:/plugins/test/getplugins/button.title: $:/plugins/test/getplugins/button
$:/plugins/test/getplugins/button.caption: {{$:/core/images/download-button}} get plugins
$:/plugins/test/getplugins/button.text: \whitespace trim <$button message="tm-modal" param="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Modals/AddPlugins" tooltip={{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Add/Hint}} class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/download-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="get plugins"/>

$:/plugins/test/getplugins/readme.title: $:/plugins/test/getplugins/readme
$:/plugins/test/getplugins/readme.text:
A button ({{$:/plugins/test/getplugins/icon}}) in the sidebar page control toolbar for quick access to the online plugins.
[[Source code|https://github.com/test/TW5-getplugins]]
